"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73450</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b119-b3f8-4017-26c7-710333747bec#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A perzsa építészet</string>
            <string language="en">persian architecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">persische Architektur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">architecture persane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arquitetura persa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">architettura persiana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περσική αρχιτεκτονική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">configuración persa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A méd és a perzsa paloták építészeti sajátosságainak ismertetése. A perszepoliszi palota bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Expounding architectural characteristics of med and persian palaces. Presentation of palace in Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Irán,  perzsa,  méd,  Parszagadai,  Perszepolisz,  Dareiosz,  Xerxész,  </string>
            <string language="en">Iran, Persia, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, Dareios, Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Erklären der architektonischen Eigenschaften
von med und persische Paläste. Darstellung des Palastes in 
Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'exposition des caractéristiques 
architecturales de med et les palais persans. Présentation de 
palais dans Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expounding características architectural de med 
e palácios persas. Apresentação do palácio em Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esposizione delle caratteristiche 
architettoniche di med e palazzi persiani. Presentazione del 
palazzo in Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη των αρχιτεκτονικών χαρακτηριστικών του MED 
και των περσικών παλατιών. Παρουσίαση του παλατιού σε 
Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exponer características arquitectónicas de med 
y los palacios persas. Presentación del palacio en Persepolis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Iran, Persien, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, 
Dareios, Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Iran, Perse, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, Dareios, 
Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irã, Persia, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, Dareios, 
Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Iran, la Persia, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, 
Dareios, Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιράν, Περσία, MED, Parsagadai, Persepolis, 
Dareios, Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Irán, Persia, med, Parsagadai, Persepolis, Dareios, 
Xerxes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
